entries.title: This $59 Anker MagSafe charger offers something Apple's doesn't
entries.description: Review: Anker's 622 MagSafe wireless charger is cheaper than Apple's and even has a kickstand for your viewing pleasure.

entries.title: McDonald's customers just got a sliver of hope in a slurry of despair
entries.description: If you're a McDonald's customer, please keep crossing your fingers. Technology can only do so much.

entries.title: iPhone 14 Pro innovation scorecard: The homeruns and the strikeouts
entries.description: Apple's flagship iPhone 14 Pro is here and it has some heady upgrades this year. But, does it keep up or stay ahead?

entries.title: The 5 best metal detectors of 2022
entries.description: Thanks to TikTok, metal detecting is surging in popularity. New and seasoned hobbyists are looking for the top metal detectors. If you want one that performs well, ZDNET did the work and found the best metal detectors you can buy -- including ones for under $100.

entries.title: The 5 best standing desk chairs and stools of 2022
entries.description: Not all standing desk chairs are created equal, and some may help you more than others. Considering factors like ergonomic design, maximum height and weight capacity, tilt and swivel functions, stability, and price, we've determined the best standing desk chairs.

entries.title: Samsung's 8-inch Galaxy Tab A just dropped to $138
entries.description: This 2018 Galaxy Tab A comes fully loaded with WiFi and an 8MP rear camera.

entries.title: This refurbished Microsoft Surface Pro 5 costs $445
entries.description: This refurbished 2017 Microsoft Surface Pro 5 is only 1.73 pounds and has an Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB fast SSD storage, Windows 10 Pro pre-installed and much more.

entries.title: Product review: RF Code Sentry for data centers
entries.description: RF Code's latest product simplifies the management of lights-out locations.
